Trần Hải Lâm 
DOB  
:  September 16th, 1990. 
Phone No 
:  
 5445 
:  
gmail.com gmail.com
Profile 
 I have over 7 years’ experience in Java development covering multiple technologies. I 
can adapt quickly to new technology. I am happy working independently or in a close 
team environment, and apply a positive attitude to every task I undertake. Working well 
with others, willing to support others, work hard and extremely responsible for all tasks 
and assignments.  
Professional Qualifications 
 
Number of year experience: 7 years. 
 
7 years of experience in developing web using J2EE, Java: 
 Other frameworks such as Spring , EJB …  
 Other technologies such as Angular, JSP , JSTL , JQuery  … 
 Other ecommerce platform as Hybris , Demandware 
 
3 years of experience in working with some databases such as: Oracle, MySQL… 
Work Experiences 
 Harvey Nash Vietnam  
7-2012  5-2015 
Software Engineer 
 
Building Java enterprise applications. 
 
Participate in the development of software applications for customers. 
 Bluecom VietNam 
6-2015   8-2017 
Senior Software Engineer 
 
Building Ecommerce website based on Hybirs. 
 
Building Ecommerce website based on Demandware. 
 
Perform coding, testing, integration and deployment. 
 Axon Active VietNam  
9-2017   now 
Senior Software Engineer 
 
Building web applications for insurance imployee based on Angular and microservices 
architecture. 
 
Perform coding, testing, integration and deployment. 
Projects 
 Weatherbys 
 
This is the enterprise web application for managing horse racing in United Kingdom. 
Main features are to manage people, animal, race, course, booking and licensing. 
Website : https://www.weatherbys.co.uk/ 
 
Duties 
o Developing racer application pages for racer. 
o Developing race management for racing admin. 
o Developing horse registration for racing admin. 
o  …. 
 
Role in Project: 
o Developer 
 
Technology used:  
o Three tiers architect using web services  
o Spring Web Service , Spring MVC 
o JQuery 
 Ocado 
 
This is the online supermarket website in United Kingdom . implement new function for 
desktop sites and port desktop site to mobile site . 
Website : https://www.ocado.com/ 
 
Dutties : 
o Developing all live-site page to responsive and change design. 
o Developing manage warehouse for admin. 
 
Role in Project: 
o Developer 
 
Technology used: 
o Struts 
o JSP / JSTL 
o JQuery 
 Dia % 
 
This is the online supermarket website in Spain . Customization of the platform and 
accelerator module to adjust to the DIA % business requirements, extending the different 
modules of the Suite. (User management, delivery time interval management, Checkout 
process, promotion, etc.), participating with the architects in the design and with the 
members of the team in the development process. 
Website : http://www.dia.es/compra-online/ 
 
Duties 
o Cusomizing default hybris to DIA design. 
o Customizing promotion rules. 
o Developing FlashSale page. 
o ….. 
 
Role in Project: 
o Developer 
 
Technology used: 
o Hybris 
o JQuery 
 L’oreal APAC 
 
L'oreal corporation have many brands on all around the world. L’oreal APAC is project 
with purpose delevop ecomerce websites for APAC area. 
o http://www.urbandecay.co.kr/ 
o http://www.clarisonic.co.kr/ 
o http://www.kiehls.co.kr/ 
o http://lancome.com.au/ 
o http://www.kiehls.com.au/ 
o …….. 
Duties 
o Developing new site base on default Salesforce Comerce Cloud. 
o Changing multi-checkout pages to single checkout page. 
o Developing workflow for send reported email . 
o Integrating login with Nice Group for Korean branch. 
o Developing shop with point function. 
o Support fixing issue on live site.  
Role in Project: 
o Developer 
Technology used: 
o Salesforce Comerce Cloud 
o JQuery 
 
 
 
 Brooks Brothers 
 
Brooks Brothers is the ecommerce website on American, offering stylish modern clothing 
and fresh takes on heritage designs for men, women, and kids. 
 
Duties : 
o Developing checkout process . 
o Integrating with payment platform (Braintree). 
o Customizing login and account page. 
 
Role in Project: 
o Backend Developer 
 
Technology used: 
o Hybris 
o JQuery 
 Mobiliar 
 
Die Mobiliar is the oldest private insurance company in Switzerland. Die Mobiliar is one 
of the best providers of home contents and personal liability insurance in the country and 
particularly stands out for the clear, quick and accommodating way in which claims are 
handled, its availability and the competence of its employees.  
Duties : 
o Developing frontend for employee. 
o Integrating with micro service. 
o Customize process for manage insurance contract and insurance offer. 
Role in Project: 
o Full stack Developer 
Technology used: 
o Angular 
o Microservices architecture. 
o EJB and Message driven bean 
 
 
 
Education  
9-2008  6-2012 
Bachelor of Information Technology in University of Sciences, HCM City 
Major: Information Technology 
(Software Technologies and Information System)
